channel.title: Server connection problem
channel.description: hello, i have had my server running for many months then i got bored and decided to shut it down. recently i decided i want to start it back up again but it wont work. i think the problem might be my no-ip but im not entirely sure. I know for a fact that my port forwarding is correct as it used to work and all my ips and ports r set correctly in source and client but it still wont work. anyone have any idea what could be wrong?

item.title: Server connection problem
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

These problems cannot really be solved by us.

Have you portforwarded correctly?
Download the newest no-ip, if you think thats the problem
etc

Read full topic
